span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个简单的集合对象，该对象可用于存储一组 对象。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CodeTypeReferenceCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeReferenceCollection/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeReferenceCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeReferenceCollection/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeReferenceCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeReferenceCollection/VB/class1.vb#1)]
